data.title: FFWD Wheels RYOT55 Disc Brake Carbon Clincher Wheel Set
data.meta_description: FFWD Wheels RYOT55 Disc Brake Carbon Clincher Wheel Set
data.text:
RYOT55

WHAT – 55mm deep tubeless ready disc brake carbon clincher wheel set.

WHO – Riders who wish the fastest and most stable 50-60mm deep wheel set for road use beating Zipp, Roval, Fulcrum and other competitors in the wind tunnel and real world.

IDEAL FOR – Flats, all-around road riding, long rides, gran fondos, road and crit racing.

QUICK SPECS

WHAT’S INCLUDED – IN THE BOX

Front and rear wheels (disc rotors/lockrings/thru axles not included)

Padded double wheel bag

Pre-installed 27mm tubeless rim tape

Pre-installed 70mm tubeless valves

EXTENDED USA LIFETIME WARRANTY

The RYOT55 comes with a USA extended lifetime warranty when purchased through ffwdusa.com or a US authorized dealer and a factory 3 year warranty and 5 year crash replacement policy.

OVERVIEW

The RYOT55 is THE wheel set for the cyclist that demands speed beating the competition by up to 2.7 watts.

A key feature of the RYOT55 is the new LAW Tech aerodynamic profile with 55mm depth, 31mm external and 21mm internal rim widths. LAW is short for ‘Laminar Airflow Wing’ and has been specially developed to deliver better aerodynamics when using wider tires by creating a smooth airflow over the rim/tire interface.

It is the wheel of choice for the cyclist that wants the fastest 50-60mm wheel set on the market. Beating the competition aerodynamically and with a 12% increase on stiffness you are ready to conquer all roads and cross winds. As the set only weighs 1700 grams it will also easily guide you uphill yet providing confidence to go fast for the descent.

As a tubeless ready wheel set and the ability to fit tires up to 42mm the RYOT55 is also a great choice for gravel and multi-surface use.

The RYOT55 is built with newly developed FFWD Two/One straight pull center-ock hubs featuring a 36 tooth ratchet system with 10 degrees of engagement, DT Swiss Aerolite and Competition spokes, DT Swiss brass nipples and 12mm thru axle (12/100mm, 12/142mm) as standard.

The RYOT55 is available with Shimano/SRAM 10-11 speed, SRAM XDR and Campagnolo 11-12 speed freehub options.

For an overview of the complete RYOT55 specifications, download the datasheet here.

SPECIFICATIONS

700c 55mm tubeless ready full carbon clincher

LAW Tech aerodynamic profile

UV Protected Decals

ETRTO 21-622

Spoke Count: 24H Front/24H Rear

Lacing Pattern: 2:1

Hub Option: FFWD Two/One 36T Straight Pull Center Lock 12mm Thru Axle

Hub Spacing: Front: 12/100mm, Rear: 12/142mm (QR adapters available)

Components: DT Aerolite/Competition, DT Pro Lock Brass Nipples

Freehub: Shimano/SRAM 10/11spd, SRAM XDR 12spd, Campagnolo 11/12spd

Color(s): Matte Black, White

Weight: 1700 grams +/- 5% (set)

Rim Width Outside: 31mm

Rim Width Inside: 21mm

Recommended Tire Width(s): 28mm (Min: 23mm, Max: 42mm)

Maximum Tire Pressure: 120psi/8.3bar

Maximum Recommended Rider Weight: 265lbs/120kg

Accessories: FFWD padded wheelbag, installed tubeless rim tape and valves

Note: Use of 27mm tubeless rim tape is required regardless of standard or tubeless setup.

SHIPPING INFORMATION

USA

We make it easy to get rolling on new wheels!

All wheel orders are shipped from our Southern California warehouse insured UPS ground at no charge in the Continental USA. Expedited shipping options (2 Day, Next Day) are available and calculated in the shopping cart once delivery details are entered.

Parts and accessories are shipped via traceable US Postal Service Priority Mail service at a flat rate charge.

Orders received before 2pm pacific time for in stock items ship the same business day. Orders received after the 2pm cut-off or on weekends ship the next business day.

Transit time ranges from 1-5 business days depending on delivery location. Typical delivery is 3-4 business days for most Continental USA destinations but may vary on seasonal volumes.

Tracking notification is sent via system generated email when the order has been processed for shipment.

If a customer account is created during checkout, you can login here to review order and shipping history.

INTERNATIONAL ORDERS

International shipping is available to a few select countries via insured DHL Express, UPS Worldwide Express and US Postal Service International Priority Mail. International shipping rates are calculated in the shopping cart once delivery address details are entered. Estimated local duty and taxes are prepaid for wheel orders that are shipped via DHL Express or UPS Worldwide Express.
